aboutSection.title: About {company}
aboutSection.description: {company} is a company from Romania in the field of international transport and logistics. We offer a full range of logistics services, including sea, land, and air transport.

hero.subtitle: BDGCARGO - your trusted partner in international transport and logistics

additionalServices.insuranceDescription: Comprehensive insurance services for cargo protection during transport
additionalServices.consultingDescription: Specialized consulting for optimizing logistics processes
additionalServices.specializedTransportDescription: Specialized transport for special and oversized cargo

contactSection.subtitle: We are here to help you with all your transport and logistics needs

partnersSection.subtitle: We collaborate with the world's largest logistics operators to offer you superior quality services

serviceCards.truckDescription: Road transport includes the movement of goods by trucks
serviceCards.shipDescription: Transporting goods by sea with containers
serviceCards.planeDescription: Fast international delivery by air freight

servicesGrid.truckDescription: Professional road transport for all types of goods
servicesGrid.warehouseDescription: Complete warehousing and inventory management solutions
servicesGrid.planeDescription: Fast air transport for urgent and valuable goods
servicesGrid.customsDescription: Full assistance for customs procedures and documentation
servicesGrid.globalDescription: Integrated logistics solutions for international trade
servicesGrid.internationalDescription: Transport services to all worldwide destinations
servicesGrid.distributionDescription: Distribution and delivery services to final destination
servicesGrid.trainDescription: Rail freight, an economical and efficient solution for large volumes
servicesGrid.combinedDescription: Custom multimodal solutions: goods delivered by route combinations (road, rail, sea, air) according to client needs

footer.companyDescription: BDGCARGO - the leading company in Romania in international transport and logistics.
